meanings.definition: Dressed in fancy or stylish clothing.
meanings.sent1: She looked duded in her sparkly dress.
meanings.sent2: The models on the runway were all duded up in designer outfits.
meanings.sent3: Even the scarecrow in the field was duded up with a bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was duded with shimmering lights at night.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's costume was duded with bright colors and a cape.

meanings.definition: To dress up in fancy or stylish clothing.
meanings.sent1: He duded himself up for the party with a sharp suit.
meanings.sent2: They duded up the venue with elegant decorations.
meanings.sent3: The cat duded up in a tiny hat for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The garden was duded up with colorful flowers and ribbons.
meanings.sent5: She duded up her hair with a pretty bow.

meanings.sent1: The duded walked confidently down the street.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the best-dressed duded in town.
meanings.sent3: The little duded insisted on wearing his superhero cape everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The old western movie featured a tough duded as the main character.
meanings.sent5: The cool duded skateboarded down the hill with ease.
